tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Enterprise Manager Fundamentals Workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: Setup compute instance running EM 13.3 with pre-configured database targets using Terraform script and Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Multitenant Database Lifecycle Management
tutorials.description: The objective of this workshop is to highlight the Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control 13câ€™s Lifecycle Management capabilities around Multitenant Database

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Database Performance Management: Find-Fix-Validate
tutorials.description: The objective is to become familiar with on-premise and Oracle Cloud Database performance management (Virtual Machine/Bare Metal/Exadata Cloud Service) capabilities using Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Automated Database Patching at Scale with Fleet Maintenance
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps needed with Fleet Maintenance to automate patching of wide range of DB Configurations including Oracle RAC environments with Data Guard Standby

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Automated Database Upgrade at Scale with Fleet Maintenance
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps needed with Fleet Maintenance to automate upgrade of wide range of DB Configurations including Oracle RAC environments with Data Guard Standby

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Database Configuration and Compliance Management
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Configuration and Compliance Management features in . It is intended solely to help you assess the business benefits of upgrading to and to plan your I.T. projects

tutorials.title: Appendix: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
tutorials.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) you may refer to when troubleshooting issues encountered while executing above labs
